name: Aviation Specialties Unlimited, Inc.
about: Aviation Specialties Unlimited, Inc. (ASU), headquartered in Boise, Idaho, has been a leading provider of aviation services since 1995. Specializing in night vision solutions, ASU offers comprehensive training programs for over 6,000 pilots and crew members, including mission-specific initial, recurrent, and CFI training for both fixed-wing and rotary-wing aircraft. Holding FAA certifications in Part 133, 135, 137, and 141, ASU's instructors have extensive experience in night vision goggle (NVG) operations. The company also provides custom NVIS aircraft modifications, maintenance, and repair services. ASU serves a diverse client base, including government agencies, law enforcement, air medical services, and defense industries, ensuring safe and sustainable night vision programs. With a commitment to excellence, ASU continues to support those who protect and defend worldwide.
